attributes.action: Consider Captain Tom Moore for a knighthood for services to the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: Please consider Cpt Tom Moore for a Knighthood on his 100th birthday.
attributes.background: Consider Cpt Tom Moore for a Knighthood on his 100th birthday for his services in raising a considerable sum of money towards the NHS's ongoing fight against Coronavirus. This man is a war veteran an embodies the very spirit of Great Britain and it's people and should be recognised as such.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
